textPlain: TheÂ discussion of how the medium affects what you build reminds me a bit of The Beginner's Guide (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Beginner's_Guide). And so the map had a lot of straight, squared corridors.I don't really remember much of that game, but for some reason that part stuck with me.
